definitions.definition: An article of clothing that is worn on the upper part of the body , and often has sleeves , either long or short, that cover the arms.
examples: He went to the mall to buy shirts his size.
It can take a while to learn how to iron a shirt properly.

definitions.definition: An interior lining in a blast furnace .
A member of the shirt-wearing team in a shirts and skins game.

main_definition: ( clothing ) An article of clothing that is worn on the upper part of the body , and often has sleeves , either long or short, that cover the arms.
